title: Apple execs talk M1 iPad Air, Mac Studio development in new interviews
content:
Apple introduced multiple new products earlier this month at its “Peek Performance” event, including the iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, and the Studio Display. Now that customers can get their hands on these products, some Apple execs shared details in new interviews about how and why they were created.

more…

The post Apple execs talk M1 iPad Air, Mac Studio development in new interviews appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple introduced iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, and the Studio Display. Now some Apple execs shared new details in interviews about these products.
